fields.value: Replication Data for: First-order continuous- and discontinuous-Galerkin moment models for a linear kinetic equation: model derivation and realizability theory

dsDescriptionValue.value: Contains the results used in the paper, additional figures and the code to reproduce the results.

publicationCitation.value: F. Schneider and T. Leibner, First-order continuous- and discontinuous-Galerkin moment models for a linear kinetic equation: model derivation and realizability theory, arXiv e-prints, (2019), p. arXiv:1902.01218

files.description: Code to reproduce the results. See README.txt for instructions on how to compile and run the code.
files.label: Code.zip

dataFile.description: Code to reproduce the results. See README.txt for instructions on how to compile and run the code.

files.description: Approximation errors for all testcases and tested moment models.
files.label: Errors.zip

dataFile.description: Approximation errors for all testcases and tested moment models.

files.description: Figures for the full moment models (order 1 to 10) for the Gauss testcase in 3d. Contains figures in Matlab (.fig) and .png format.
files.label: FiguresGauss3d_FullmomentsOrder1-10.zip

dataFile.description: Figures for the full moment models (order 1 to 10) for the Gauss testcase in 3d. Contains figures in Matlab (.fig) and .png format.

files.description: Results for the Gauss testcase in 1d. Contains one .txt file for each tested moment model. The first column in each file specifies the x coordinate, the second column contains the value of the approximate distribution at x.
files.label: ResultsGauss1d.zip

dataFile.description: Results for the Gauss testcase in 1d. Contains one .txt file for each tested moment model. The first column in each file specifies the x coordinate, the second column contains the value of the approximate distribution at x.

files.description: Results for the full moment models for the Gauss testcase in 3d. Contains one .txt file for each tested model. The first three columns in each file specify the x, y and z coordinate, the fourth column contains the value of the approximate distribution at (x, y, z).
files.label: ResultsGauss3d_Fullmoments.zip

dataFile.description: Results for the full moment models for the Gauss testcase in 3d. Contains one .txt file for each tested model. The first three columns in each file specify the x, y and z coordinate, the fourth column contains the value of the approximate distribution at (x, y, z).

files.description: Results for the hatfunction models for the Gauss testcase in 3d. Contains one .txt file for each tested moment model. The first three columns in each file specify the x, y and z coordinate, the fourth column contains the value of the approximate distribution at (x, y, z).
files.label: ResultsGauss3d_Hatfunctions.zip
